title: Which star sign lives longest? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do not know of any credible research which has been able to show a statistically significant result for ANY Sun sign (or what you call a “star sign”). No matter what your natal chart looks like, make a concerted effort to get plenty of exercise, avoid junk food, keep sugar and cured meats to a bare minimum, and consume plenty of veggies, fruits and nuts. These steps are far more important than what your horoscope looks like. Please keep in mind that if you are seeking to understand and improve your health and longevity potential, your Sun sign alone is not going to yield insights. You cannot “dumb down” astrology to just 12 Sun signs.

My research into longevity and birth charts indicates that on average the people with the water element prominent have the longest lives, while people with the fire element prominent have the shortest lives. However, this research is based on entire birth charts - and not on Sun signs alone. The longevity project is described in detail here: The art of compressing a chart
